feed.subtitle: We are epigenomics and computational biology lab within the Division of Human Genetics and Biomedical Informatics in the Cincinnati Childrenâ€™s Hospital Medical Center (CCHMC) and also part of the Department of Pediatrics in University of Cincinnati College of Medicine.
